title: Apple Inc ($AAPL) found buyers at the blue box area as expected
text:
Elliott Wave Forecast Team

ElliottWave-Forecast.com In today’s article, we will look at the past performance of the 1H Hour Elliott Wave chart of Apple Inc ($AAPL). The rally from 12.11.2023 low at $191.42 unfolded as 5 waves. So, we expected the pullback to unfold in 3 swings and find buyers at 195.31 – 193.16. We will explain the structure & forecast below:  Here is the 1H Elliott Wave count from 12.17.2023. We expected the pullback to find buyers from the blue box area at red 4 in a 3 swing structure (ABC) at 195.31 – 193.16.  Here is the 1H update few days later, showing the bounce taking place as expected. The stock reacted higher after reaching the blue box area allowing longs to get a risk free position. EUR/USD trades in positive territory near 1.0850 in the early American session on Tuesday. The US Dollar struggles to find demand despite better than expected Durable Goods Orders data for February, allowing the pair to hold its ground. GBP/USD is holding gains at around 1.2650 in the second half of the day on Tuesday. The pair capitalizes on renewed USD selling as risk sentiment recovers, reducing the haven demand for the Greenback. Upbeat US data fail to provide a boost to the USD. Gold gathered bullish momentum after breaking above $2,180 and extended its rally toward $2,200 on Tuesday. The selling pressure surrounding the US Dollar and the pullback seen in the US T-bond yields help XAU/USD stretch higher. Bitcoin’s directional bias has been unclear lately after its dip below $70,000. This development has split the community into bulls - expecting a resumption of the uptrend, and bears - looking for signs of a reversal. CB Consumer Confidence is expected to recover modestly in March after the first slide in four months. Financial markets seem to have fully digested the Federal Reserve’s caution.
